mapper.select: select * from feed_reply where is_delete = false and feed_id = #{feedId} and comment_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY reply_id DESC LIMIT #{size}
select * from feed_reply where is_delete = false and feed_id = #{feedId} and and comment_id = #{commentId} reply_id < #{key} ORDER BY reply_id DESC LIMIT #{size}
select * from feed_reply where reply_id = #{replyId} and is_delete = false
mapper.insert: insert into feed_reply (user_id,feed_id,comment_id,reply,is_delete,created_at,modified_at) values (#{userId}, #{feedId}, #{commentId}, #{reply}, false, now(), now())
mapper.update: update feed_reply set reply = #{reply}, modified_at = now() where reply_id = #{replyId} and user_id = #{userId} and feed_id = #{feedId} and comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.delete: update feed_reply set is_delete = true where reply_id = #{replyId} and user_id = #{userId} and feed_id = #{feedId} and comment_id = #{commentId}
